attributes.action: All celebrities that appear on children in need to donate 100% of their fee to children in need.
attributes.additional_details: Celebrities that appear on children in need should not receive any payment. They only go on to promote their selves and their product in the run up to Christmas. Retail outlets are just as bad. Their name on a very large check is the cheapest advertisement on TV.  They haven't  given the money , it is the customers and staff that have given the money
